patterns: what is the location of the PES
what is the location of the PES UOJ SBC
what is the location of the PES SBC
responses: IEEE PES UOJ SBC is located at Faculty of Engineering, University of Jaffna, Sri Lanka.
IEEE stands for the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers. It's a professional association for electronic and electrical engineers.

patterns: How can I access IEEE publications?
responses: IEEE Xplore is a digital library where you can access a vast collection of IEEE publications. Check if your institution provides access or consider IEEE membership for full access.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses: well, students should be following Electrical and Electronic Engineering at Univeristy of Jaffna

patterns: how many classes of membership available
responses: There are two classes as Student membership and Staff membership, log itno IEEE official webiste for info
